item.title: 前总统特朗普已经开始在一种新的共和党竞选中留下自己的印记：共和党领袖米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）的继任者之争。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is already beginning to leave his mark on a new sort of Republican race: the race to succeed Republican leader Mitch McConnell. https://t.co/5y6bfGh3He

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 根据法庭记录，一名被控在四十多年间为古巴情报机构从事间谍活动的前美国大使周四告诉法官，他计划在自己的案件中认罪。
item.description:
A former U.S. ambassador charged with spying for Cuban intelligence over a more than four-decade span told a judge Thursday he plans to plead guilty in his case, according to court records. https://t.co/rD6bqmw4Kz

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统呼吁前总统特朗普共同努力，通过一项两党边境安全法案。
item.description:
Pres. Biden called on former Pres. Trump to work together to pass a bipartisan border security bill that has been blocked by GOP lawmakers at his predecessor's request. https://t.co/KRdOP4DVdD pic.twitter.com/qEYGgUqqNt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 一项新的研究显示，在长达数年的海洋热浪的破坏性影响下，北太平洋约有 7,000 头座头鲸在 2012 年至 2021 年期间死亡。
item.description:
Approximately 7,000 humpback whales in the North Pacific Ocean died between 2012 and 2021 after the damaging effects of a yearslong marine heatwave, according to a new study. https://t.co/x6EwfdBe5X pic.twitter.com/hlzdqfsoEK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 消息人士透露，被指控泄露机密军事文件并将其发布到网上的马萨诸塞州空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）已与联邦检察官达成认罪协议。
item.description:
BREAKING: Jack Teixeira, the Massachusetts Air National Guardsman accused of leaking classified military documents and posting them online, has reached an agreement with federal prosecutors to plead guilty, sources say. https://t.co/EfaHzqES3n pic.twitter.com/ktIkohLonp

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在边境给前总统特朗普的致辞："与其告诉国会议员阻止这项立法，不如和我一起--或者我和你一起--告诉国会通过这项两党边境安全法案。我们可以一起做到这一点"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden’s message to former Pres. Trump from the border: “Instead of telling members of Congress to block this legislation, join me — or I’ll join you — in telling the Congress to pass this bipartisan border security bill. We can do it together.” https://t.co/wD9UMC4uil pic.twitter.com/mbN67YWu7l

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 29, 2024

item.title: 费城地方检察官办公室宣布，一名因 1994 年纵火谋杀一名妇女而被定罪并判处死刑的费城男子在 30 年后被免于起诉。
item.description:
A Philadelphia man who was convicted and sentenced to death in connection with the 1994 arson murder of a woman is now exonerated 30 years later, the city's District Attorney's Office announced. https://t.co/bnB9TGN6SO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 消息人士透露，被指控泄露机密军事文件并将其发布到网上的马萨诸塞州空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）已与联邦检察官达成认罪协议。

item.title: 佛罗里达州当局表示，他们相信已经找到了一名 16 岁女孩的遗骸，该女孩于 2004 年失踪，历经近 20 年才揭开谜底。
item.description:
Florida authorities said they believe they've recovered the remains of a 16-year-old girl who vanished in 2004 in a mystery that took almost two decades to unravel. https://t.co/1e5RGgdEVm

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 成功起诉唐纳德-特朗普诽谤的专栏作家 E. Jean Carroll 的律师反对前总统试图暂停执行陪审团命令他支付的 8,330 万美元判决。
item.description:
Attorneys for columnist E. Jean Carroll, who successfully sued Donald Trump for defamation, objected to the former president's attempt to pause enforcement of the $83.3 million judgment the jury ordered him to pay. https://t.co/80DTmLPBDt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀（Lloyd Austin）在作证时说，他对自己在接受手术以及后来因并发症住进重症监护室时瞒着白宫负有 "全部责任"。
item.description:
Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin testified that he takes "full responsibility" for keeping the White House in the dark when he underwent surgery and later when he was admitted to the intensive care unit after suffering complications. https://t.co/kjTP6r34Ny

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：克莱斯勒召回超过 33 万辆吉普大切诺基，原因是方向盘问题可能导致驾驶员失去对车辆的控制。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Chrysler is recalling more than 330,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees because of a steering wheel issue that may cause drivers to lose control of their vehicles. https://t.co/rfdjMgl985 pic.twitter.com/dkxQEf5XDa

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 德克萨斯州居民在地面上和无人机在空中拍摄到的画面显示了致命的烟屋溪大火所造成的破坏规模，这场大火是该州历史上最大的野火。
item.description:
Footage captured by Texas residents on the ground and by a drone in the air shows the scale of destruction left by the deadly Smokehouse Creek Fire, now the largest wildfire in state history. https://t.co/696aFULoQo pic.twitter.com/gaD0EcipZH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局周四对纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）的亚裔事务主管温妮-格雷科（Winnie Greco）在布朗克斯区的家进行了搜查。
item.description:
The FBI carried out a search Thursday at the Bronx home of Winnie Greco, the director of Asian affairs for New York City Mayor Eric Adams. https://t.co/DUH9d1BLml

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 凯莉-瑞帕（Kelly Ripa）和马克-康苏埃洛斯（Mark Consuelos）正在进行一次回忆之旅。这对夫妇参观了拉斯维加斯的钟楼教堂，他们早在 1996 年就在那里私奔了，而且没有错过重现婚礼当天照片的机会。
item.description:
Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos are taking a trip down memory lane.

The couple visited Chapel of the Bells in Las Vegas where they eloped back in 1996 — and didn't miss out on the opportunity to recreate a photo from their wedding day. https://t.co/9ZhGd2LTwM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国平均长期抵押贷款利率连续第四周上升，在春季购房旺季来临之际，这对有意购房者来说又是一次挫折。
item.description:
The average long-term U.S. mortgage rate rose for the fourth consecutive week, another setback for prospective homebuyers just as the spring home-buying season ramps up. https://t.co/WfqwiIRVFg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：阿拉巴马州最高法院关于胚胎是儿童的裁决引起了人们对该州试管婴儿治疗的质疑，在此之后，阿拉巴马州众议院通过了恢复试管婴儿治疗的立法。
item.description:
JUST IN: The Alabama House of Representatives has passed legislation to restore access to IVF after a state Supreme Court ruling that embryos are children raised questions about the treatment in the state. https://t.co/au2GwXBoOf pic.twitter.com/W8LhagxA0G

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 俄克拉荷马州一位闰日出生的妇女因庆祝自己的百岁生日而受到俄克拉荷马州百岁老人协会的表彰，尽管她只庆祝了 25 个实际生日。
item.description:
An Oklahoma woman — born on leap day — has been recognized by the Centenarians of Oklahoma for celebrating her 100th birthday, despite only having celebrated 25 actual birthdates. https://t.co/n883yoBLFw

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：众议院投票通过了一项短期拨款法案，以避免政府在周五截止日期前部分关门。该法案现将提交参议院。
item.description:
BREAKING: The House voted to pass a short-term funding bill to avert a partial government shutdown before a Friday deadline. The bill now moves to the Senate. https://t.co/Zl4c0Yxaji

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据肯辛顿宫发言人称，威尔士王妃凯特在腹部手术后的恢复过程中 "表现良好"。该声明是在网上对凯特的健康状况进行猜测时发表的。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, is "doing well" as she continues to recover from abdominal surgery, according to a Kensington Palace spokesperson.

The statement comes amid speculation online about Kate's well-being. https://t.co/G8AmDcgeP0 pic.twitter.com/5qWCiPnpNM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据肯辛顿宫发言人称，威尔士王妃凯特在腹部手术后的恢复过程中 "表现良好"。

Kate, the Princess of Wales, is "doing well" as she continues to recover from abdominal surgery, according to a Kensington Palace spokesperson. https://t.co/Lxcy4WIwau

item.title: 上周申请失业救济的美国人增多，但裁员人数仍处于历史低位，即使今年有更多知名企业宣布裁员。
item.description:
More Americans applied for jobless benefits last week, but layoffs remain historically low, even as more high-profile companies announced job cuts this year. https://t.co/T6NwnbTS1D

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 法国总统马克龙大胆承诺将在塞纳河中游泳，为了迎接巴黎奥运会，塞纳河目前正在进行清理。为了让这条自 1923 年起就禁止游泳的河流重新可以游泳，法国正在投入大量资金。
item.description:
French President Macron has boldly promised to swim in the River Seine, which is currently being cleaned in anticipation of the Paris Olympics.

Investments are being poured into making the river — off limits to bathers since 1923 — swimmable again. https://t.co/7Mmg0CRssM

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州斯帕坦斯堡一名 23 岁的阿米什族孕妇死亡，目前正在紧急搜捕凶手。
item.description:
An urgent search is underway for a killer responsible for the death of a 23-year-old pregnant Amish woman in Spartansburg, Pennsylvania. https://t.co/1YE0uK2lsw pic.twitter.com/5rzsXf7SHE

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据一位知情人士透露，匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orbán）将于下周在马阿拉歌（Mar-a-Lago）访问美国前总统特朗普。

item.title: 据纽约市建筑部称，纽约市官员已经腾空了布朗克斯区的一家家具店，该店曾被改建为数十名移民的住所，"居住条件很不安全"。
item.description:
New York City officials have vacated a Bronx furniture store that was converted to house dozens of migrants in "unsafe living conditions," according to the New York City Dept. of Buildings. https://t.co/A9UZoG1nZ2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 随着新的暴风雪系统进入山区，加州暴风雪预警生效，可能带来 10 英尺以上的积雪。
item.description:
A blizzard warning is in effect in California as a new storm system moves into the mountains with potential to deliver more than 10 feet of snow. https://t.co/vnubAlWgxD pic.twitter.com/dBh9cdYTsc

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024

item.title: 福特电动汽车的车主现在可以使用特斯拉在美国和加拿大的大部分充电网络，但有一个小问题。

Owners of Ford electric vehicles can now use much of Tesla's charging network in the U.S. and Canada — but there's a hitch. https://t.co/2kLchoWmCS

item.title: 通货膨胀改变了许多美国人的购物方式。现在，这些消费习惯的改变正在帮助降低通货膨胀。
item.description:
Inflation has changed the way many Americans shop. Now, those changes in consumer habits are helping bring down inflation. https://t.co/p0PLelcE31

— ABC News (@ABC) February 29, 2024
